properties.title: «eau-là-là - Wellness and Pleasure Pool Davos
properties.abstract: Thanks to «eau-là-là», Davos is now also an oasis for everyone who loves swimming. On the ground floor you'll find the aqua adventure pools, while the two upper floors house the dreamlike world of the wellness centre.
properties.description:
The aqua adventure pools on the ground floor tempt bathers to dive in for a swim, to relax and splash about. Behind a glass frontage, this bathing paradise is in full view of wonderful parkland, and the majestic mountains.

Young children have great fun in the kids' pool, splashing about without a care. For older children the 80-metre «Black Hole» slide is an absolute must. For the more conventional there is a 25-metre swimming pool with diving-boards. Outside is a heated-pool and beautiful lawns where you can relax.

Leave the everyday routine behind you and step into a wellness oasis! Upstairs you find a Finnish sauna Take your time and be rejuvenated! Move onto the hydrotherapy pool. Next it's into the cold bath. Rest in the quiet room, before going to the steam bath on the roof. Finally, finish off in the club room with its fireplace and impressive view. Heaven on earth!
properties.name: Wellness- und Erlebnisbad «eau-là-là»
